codeandchords

Class ShapeEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • codeandchords.MenuTemplate
      • codeandchords.ShapeEditor

  • public class ShapeEditor
extends MenuTemplate

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShapeEditor(PApplet parent, Shape[] shapes, Module module, float fullAppletWidth, float fullAppletHeight)
      This constructor should be used to create a scaled version of the shaper editor that is scaled based off of the window that the shape is displayed in THIS IS THE PREFERED CONSTRUCOR
      ShapeEditor(PApplet parent, Shape[] shapes, Module module, float fullAppletWidth, float fullAppletHeight, ControlP5 controlP5)
      Almost the same as previous constructor, but with a ControlP5.
      ShapeEditor(PApplet parent, Shape shape, Module module, float fullAppletWidth, float fullAppletHeight)
      This constructor should be used to create a scaled version of the shaper editor that is scaled based off of the window that the shape is displayed in THIS IS THE PREFERED CONSTRUCOR
      ShapeEditor(PApplet parent, Shape shape, Module module, float fullAppletWidth, float fullAppletHeight, ControlP5 controlP5)
      Same constructor as above, but with a ControlP5.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buttonEvent(int id)
      Child classes will implement this method to use the Buttons connected to ColorWheels and Textfields (corresponding CW and Textfield have already been shown or hidden in controlEvent).
      void colorWheelEvent(int id, java.awt.Color color)
      Child classes will implement this method to use the ColorWheels connected to Buttons and Textfields (corresponding Textfield has already been updated in controlEvent).
      void controlEvent(ControlEvent theEvent)
      This method should be called in children's controlEvent if they used addSliderGroup() or addColorWheelGroup and want to use the Slider/Textfield and Button/ColorWheel/Textfield functionality.
      void drawShape(int shapeIndex) 
      void drawShape(int shapeIndex, int curHueNum) 
      void drawShapes() 
      Shape getShape() 
      int getShapeIndex() 
      Shape[] getShapes() 
      void runMenu()
      Shows or hides this.controlP5, depending on whether or not the Menu is open, and then calls drawMenu(); should be called every time through draw.
      void setNumActiveShapes(int numActiveShapes) 
      void sliderEvent(int id, float val)
      Child classes will implement this method to use the values of Sliders added by this.addSliderGroup() (corresponding Textfield has been set in controlEvent).
      void updateSliders()

    • Method Detail

      • runMenu

        public void runMenu()
        Description copied from class: MenuTemplate
        Shows or hides this.controlP5, depending on whether or not the Menu is open, and then calls drawMenu(); should be called every time through draw.
        Overrides:
        runMenu in class MenuTemplate
        Parameters:
        xPos - x position of the shape in the main window
        yPos - y position of the shape in the main window
        rotation - rotation of the shape in the main window

      • drawShapes

        public void drawShapes()

      • controlEvent

        public void controlEvent(ControlEvent theEvent)
        Description copied from class: MenuTemplate
        This method should be called in children's controlEvent if they used addSliderGroup() or addColorWheelGroup and want to use the Slider/Textfield and Button/ColorWheel/Textfield functionality. It will be called automatically from Controllers.
        Overrides:
        controlEvent in class MenuTemplate
        Parameters:
        theEvent - event from the current Controller

      • sliderEvent

        public void sliderEvent(int id,
                        float val)
        Description copied from class: MenuTemplate
        Child classes will implement this method to use the values of Sliders added by this.addSliderGroup() (corresponding Textfield has been set in controlEvent).
        Specified by:
        sliderEvent in class MenuTemplate
        Parameters:
        id - id of Slider
        val - value of Slider

      • buttonEvent

        public void buttonEvent(int id)
        Description copied from class: MenuTemplate
        Child classes will implement this method to use the Buttons connected to ColorWheels and Textfields (corresponding CW and Textfield have already been shown or hidden in controlEvent).
        Specified by:
        buttonEvent in class MenuTemplate
        Parameters:
        id - id of the current Button

      • colorWheelEvent
